title: Aparthotel Adagio Aix-en-Provence Centre
description:
Ideally located on a peaceful street in the center of Aix-en-Provence, this residence is a 10-minute walk from the cafés and fountains on Cours Mirabeau. Gare d’Aix-en-Provence is 2953 feet away. Free WiFi is available in all areas.

Apartments and studios at Aparthotel Adagio Aix en Provence Center are contemporary in style and offer an LCD TV. All have a kitchen with hotplates and some have a separate bedroom.

Breakfast and drinks and snacks vending machines are some of the other facilities on offer at Aparthotel Adagio Aix en Provence Center. There is also a 24-hour reception with luggage storage and a dry cleaning service.

Rotonde Square is a 5-minute walk away and Aix-en-Provence Natural History Museum is just 2789 feet from the residence. For guests arriving by car, private indoor parking is possible on site, according to availability. A8 highway is 1.6 mi away.

top_reviews.review: Great location, spacious, modern and clean with great facilities such as a helpful front desk, pleasant outdoor area, delicious breakfast and laundry service. Small parking making it difficult for our SUV. We parked at the parking relay Lieutenant Colonel Jean-Pierre 7 mins away that also offers free shuttle back to La Roronde (12 mns) near the hotel. We left the car for 3 days while visiting Aix and walked everywhere. It was perfect and parking is cheap $3.50/24 hrs. A nice option to know since it is difficult to park in Aix.
Perfect location. Quiet. Nice staff, also flexible. Nothing really.

Great Facilities 
Great Stuff
Parking in the building (costs 13€ a day)
Everything was perfect. Size of room and very comfortable.
Location was great and available staff was courteous I expected a better mattress to sleep on.

Great location - 10 minutes by foot to the markets and restaurants,  nice and friendly staff, kitchen fully equipped, smart TV, nice decor, parking, pets allowed, elevator. The parking is a bit tight - but it works for cars up to 4.5 meters long.
Breakfast was additional cost and too expensive for what they had available. Kitchenette was great, fresh food markets all around and we just cooked our own meals.

This is the perfect place for small families who need a retreat from the bustle of the city and also need a chance to cook or prepare their own food. The room was very baby friendly and we were provided with a baby bed and told that we could get a small bath for our baby as well. Downstairs in the dining area there were several high chair options and a play area for little ones. It had high-end hostel vibes without being a hostel, and parking close to the hotel. Everything was great!
Spacious room with many facilities available. Near the tourist office also.
Good location, parking, view, good staff, very welcome, you can buy food and drinks in the lobby, all information about town is there too. Rooms was a bit tiny

property_information: The Aparthotel Adagio Aix-en-Provence Centre is situated in the centre of the city, close to the Rotonde and the legendary Cours Mirabeau. This 4-star tourist residence has 89 fully equipped flats ranging from studios that sleep 2 to 3-room flats that sleep 6. The complex is perfect for both family holidays as well as business trips. Guests have use of numerous facilities including a launderette, ironing service and private toll parking. Our reception staff are on hand 24 hours a day. Combining the flexibility of an apartment with the services of a hotel, Adagio aparthotels are the best solution for medium and long stays, offering the utmost comfort and value for money to business travelers, vacationers and those who like to be both.

title: Best Western Hotel le Galice Aix-en-Provence
description:
Located a 10-minute walk from the center of Aix-en-Provence, Best Western Le Galice Center Ville features a seasonal outdoor pool and a terrace. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, a desk, a kettle and a mini-bar. The private bathrooms have a bath or shower and a hairdryer.

The hotel has business facilities, including fully equipped meeting rooms open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. There is also a 24-hour reception.

Best Western Le Galice Center Ville is 16 mi from Marseille Provence Airport and 9.3 mi from Aix-en-Provence TGV Train Station. A secured underground car park is available for an extra fee.

top_reviews.review: Fairly new hotel, very modern, comfortable beds, mini frig, quiet, helpful staff Breakfast room was down about 8 steps with no wheelchair ramp.

Nice comfortable clean good sized room and an ideal location.
Car Parking is very convenient and easily accessible. 
lastly, i have to mention the amazing scent in the hotel, it smells wonderful and very pleasant. Not much, only one comment regarding the air conditioning that wasn't functioning well unfortunately, room was very humid and i woke up at night sweating, and for sometime it was even leaking.
We ate out every morning. Good location to everything . Underground parking was secure. Room safe didn’t work.

Great location, easily reachable by car (all highways), and 10 min walk from the city center.
Spacious & Clean Room, great comfy bed. Friendly staff.
The pool and patio is so refreshing, especially during summer.
Spacious (but paid - 16€/day) underground parking. Really to say something:
- Gluten free option at Breakfast was very, very limited.
- 16€/day parking on top of the room rate, is a bit expensive.
- Maybe increase the pool time in the evening (only 20:00)
Comfortable room - nice staff- location pretty good if you don’t mind walking. The pool was freezing cold. We had chosen the hotel because of the pool.
big modern rooms, nice bathroom. comfortable beds. great pool location not the best but still an easy walk into the centre
The young girl at the front desk was extremely helpful with her dining recommendations The location is more than just a 10 minute walk to the central plaza- more like 15 minutes
Appreciated how friendly and informative the staff were when we had questions about different things.
The breakfast was very rich, the rooms were comfortable and clean and the staff was friendly. ------------
Everything was very good, the food , the facilities and the staff was very helpful, friendly and cooperative We do not have any complaints

title: B&B HOTEL Aix-en-Provence Pont de l'Arc
description:
Offering free WiFi, B&B HÃ´tel Aix-en-Provence Pont de l'Arc is located in Aix-en-Provence. This 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom. Cours Mirabeau is 1.4 mi from the hotel.

Accessed via a staircase, all guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the property. A shared microwave is available to guests as well as a vending machine for drinks and snacks.

Saint-Sauveur Cathedral is 1.7 mi from B&B HÃ´tel Aix-en-Provence Pont de l'Arc. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 16 mi from the accommodations.
property_highlights: Free private parking available at the hotel

top_reviews.review: Good location off the highway, and driving distance to a few restaurants. Good place to stay when traveling in the area that accommodates people who have vehicles and dogs. This hotel chain maintains a dependable standard in their hotels.

Nice, clean, quiet hotel. They had recycling bins in the lobby, which was very handy. Pretty far from the city center since we didn't have a car. It was about 30-minute uphill walk to get to the old town.

The staff are extremely friendly. All are nice and helpful. You can reach anywhere from here either with bus or rented car. There is plenty of parking spaces. Next to it is a big station with bus/flixbus parking lot and the highway. There is a strange smell on the first floor at the door after the stair. But it doesn't reached into the room, so it is rather ok.

Just what we were looking for, clean and reasonable and close to the city center. Our room was facing a fairly busy road, but the walls must be super thick as we didn't hear a thing and I'm a light sleeper. We were just passing through.I needed a place to stay' but i'm so glad we stopped in Aix-en-Provence for a few hours. Fantastic city! We'll be back!

Staff are accommodating.
Good location if you want to stay out of Aix city center. Few meters away from the bus station if you want to visit the city.

Marvellous location right next to the motorway yet soundproofed so we didn’t hear it. Receptionist was brilliant and directed us to 3 restaurants less than 10 mins walk away. All simple, clean, secure parking. Perfect.

We were very pleased with the disability room which we had booked. 
The breakfast was very good, with scrambled eggs and bacon an unexpected treat! We liked it all

Friendly and helpful staff
Seamless check-in and check-out
Good breakfast 
Comfortable bed
Quiet environment 
Close to small eateries
Can order takeaways
Can join BnB Hotel membership for free and get discount on next stay A bit of mold in shower booth
No lift

Amazing location, perfect for solo travellers like me who stay for a 2-3 days. Perfect if you have a vehicle, has parking, although parking space does get full if you are out all day driving and get back in the night and there is no parking spaces available. 
The room was cosy, hot water, clean, location was perfect, easy access to highway to get to airport and around. Reception has a microwave which is handy for when you want to reheat your food. Big plus. Definitely would stay again 10/10 Nothing, everything was perfect.
Very good value. Good free parking. Convenient for public transport.

title: Villa Saint-Ange
description:
Set 2625 ft from Cours Mirabeau in Aix-en-Provence, Villa Saint-Ange hotel features a heated outdoor swimming pool, a Provencal garden, and a French restaurant and bar with a terrace. This property is 1.4 mi from Saint-Sauveur Cathedral.

Rooms are spread across five 18th-century bastide-style cottages, decorated in the style of an Aix-en-Provence town house. All rooms include air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with international channels, a safety deposit box, and a mini-bar. The private bathroom has free toiletries and a hair dryer. Rooms on ground level feature a terrace or garden.

There is an on-site restaurant with a terrace, which serves a variety of French dishes and also offers vegetarian and vegan options. Room service is available 24/7.

Guests can make use of the hot tub and fitness room, or enjoy a massage at a supplement. Hiking is among the activities that guests can enjoy near the accommodations.

Speaking English and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always on hand to help.

Caumont Art Center is 2297 ft away. Marseille Provence Airport is 19 mi from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. Covered parking is available on site at a supplement.

top_reviews.review:
This was overall a stunning property! The room was very well appointed and comfortable. The bed was comfortable. 
The staff was extremely friendly and helpful from the front desk to the restaurant and waiters. We appreciated the fabulous service from them all, especially looking after our little dog, Charlee with extra water bowls, and a bed. 

The breakfast buffet has a lavish selection and loved that they custom make any extra eggs or food that you like. 

And the dining room by night served a five star Michelin gourmet meal with an excellent team from the kitchen. 

We loved a lot of the little extras like cold water bottles in our car every time, the fedora hats, flip-flops and beach bag in the room. The housekeeping could use a little better follow-through. We ran out of things throughout our stay like toilet paper, bath soap, the second bathrobe didn’t come back. They were quick to bring it when we found, but it was a bit of a hassle, running out of things.  

Also, the Jacuzzi temperature was freezing. It would be nice to have it hotter, especially in the cold weather. 

It was a little further away from the center than we would’ve liked. The walk was doable but being closer what happened nicer

Beautiful hotel just a short walk from the center of town. We had a junior suite so we had a large room overlooking the well tended grounds and a bathroom with 2 sinks & shower big enough for 2 shower heads. It was the most comfortable bed of our entire trip. Breakfast was a lovely buffet - we ate outside because the weather was perfect. We loved sitting by the pool after a long day of sight seeing. The staff were friendly and professional. Nothing - great stay

Rooms were very lovely and comfortable. The night staff, including front desk and valet, were incredible! They made us fill very welcome. The day time staff at the front desk were cold and, at times, seemed bothered by our appearance.  The caller, however, was very friendly and helpful.

Service / staff were incredible! Parking so easy, great recommendations, their concierge helped us book dinner reservations and an Ebike ride throughout Luberon which were all perfect. Tiny gym but you can just go for a run
Exceptional service. Exceptionally quiet and relaxing. An oasis in the south of France.

Everything! A lot of thought was put into the guest comfort. We had one of the smaller rooms- perfect!The most comfortable hotel we have ever stayed in with 40 years of travel. 
The staff was extremely friendly and helpful- always a smile!
The grounds were beautiful! Can’t think of a thing.
Beautiful suite and friendly, accommodating staff.

Breakfast was great! Room 23 was gorgeous, loved having a corner room.
Tommy was super nice! Restaurant recommendations were a bit basic, too touristy for us

The property, the rooms and the staff are 1st class. You can tell that the property and rooms were designed with every detail well considered and thought out. No expense appears to have been spared to give guests the best possible experience. Nothing. Everything was amazing.
The size of the rooms is large and they are beautifully decorated! It feels like you are in another era where civilization mattered. Nothing really. Perhaps hotter water for tea…

title: Le Concorde
description:
Le Concorde is ideally located in the center of Aix-en-Provence, only a 5-minute walk from the famous Cour Mirabeau and near the Granet Museum. It offers a flowered garden.

The guest rooms all feature a TV, air-conditioning and Wi-Fi access.

You can start the day with a generous breakfast in the breakfast room or in the courtyard.

For guests arriving by car, the hotel has a large private garage in the basement available for an additional charge, allowing you to explore the city without any parking worries.

top_reviews.review: Loved being able to park on site, the room was really bright and luminous, and I loved having a private terrase.

Parking was great
Extremely pleasant and helpful reception
Quiet Missing a place to put soap in the shower

The room was great and the staff were very accommodating and helpful. I arrived in an Electric Vehicle, and there was nowhere to charge it. The staff couldn't direct me to any nearby charging station either.

It had three separate beds and generally suited our needs. The location was just what we wanted. The price was right! Oh, and storage space was good for such a small place (nice big drawers under the sink) and there was a heating rack in the bathroom. (These features were missing in the much more expensive place to which we moved next.) We found it odd that it opened directly to the outside, like a motel, which seemed less secure. Perhaps that’s nice in the summer? Space was tight (but not surprising for the price).  It was unfortunate that all three beds were in the same room, as one of us snored (but again, not surprising for the price).
Love the family rooms - beds and pillows were comfy and rooms were quiet.  Walk across the street and you’re in the city
Clean, spacious with very comfortable bed and helpful staff.
Very comfortable bed in spacious and clean room, internal court has few tables and spots to relax
Good location, short walk into old town, clean  and next to a supermarket too! It was great!
Having parking was a huge deal.  Staff were amazing and beds and pillows, sheets where so comfy and relaxing nothing other than wanted to stay longer

- clean
- good location but not very central 
- beside a big supermarket One of the two rooms I booked had a very small bathroom

title: Les Suites du Cours & Spa
description:
Set in Aix-en-Provence in Cours Mirabeau, Les Suites du Cours & Spa features a spa center. Saint-Sauveur Cathedral is 1969 feet away. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property.

All units feature air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. There is a seating and/or dining area in some units. There is also a kitchen complete with a dishwasher and oven. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Each unit is fitted with a private bathroom with a bath or shower, free toiletries, and a hairdryer. Bed linen is provided.

Greffe Commercial Court Aix-en-Provence is 328 feet from Les Suites du Cours & Spa. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 13 mi from Les Suites du Cours & Spa.

top_reviews.review: We just loved it! We really felt the experience of being in this beautiful city. Everything was there. We had a lovely view of the market in the morning, and there were plenty of restaurants and shops just downstairs.

Fabulous Location. 
Lots of Charm. 
Enough space to spread around. The only negative I can find is I wish there were curtains/glass around the shower in/next to the bedrooms. For privacy as well as to not splash water out. 
Everything else was superb.

If you want to be right in the center of everything in Aix - staying on a building that was built in 1615 this is THE place. It is hard to describe our stay in the junior suite. Opening the French doors to the balcony and looking out at the action on le Mirabeau was awesome. The property is a mix of very old world and super modern. The descending the steps to the spa is like entering another dimension! The amenities like washing machine, dishwasher, cook top made us wish we could have stayed longer. The market Tuesday mornings right out the front door is super special. Highly recommended. The sleeping loft has some beams that make you duck as you move around, but easy to adapt to.

Great location on a central street which is restricted for cars, so very little traffic. Local events are held on this street. We saw a parade and had a street market set up right outside our apartment!!   The suite was lovely-very traditional with balconies but also modern conveniences you would expect.  The hosts were great with providing clear guidance. Definitely recommend. All was great!

Contemporary and modern loft with all the amenities . Well equipped for extended stay. Feels like home. Right on Cours Mirabeau with balcony … location, location, LOCATION!!! One low ceiling beam in the loft bedroom could be challenging for a tall person.
It was on the most famous street of Aix-en-Provence.  It was very clean and well equiped. The appartment is so historical. We liked it a lot.

So charming 
Everything is in the details…
Definitely my best French experience so far
Loved this place. Maybe the best one of the entire trip. Great location, rooms, views, breakfast, staff, spa, cleanliness, brightness, just perfect!
In the heart of Aix. Lovely building and modern rooms with a view. Elevator connivence to our room from street. Very clean. Our host was wonderful.
It was right in the middle of the action in Aix but still very quiet

property_information:
In the most beautiful private mansion on Cours Mirabeau built in 1655, under Louis XIV. Exceptional volumes, stylish decoration.
Suites for 2 to 9 people; from 30 to 105 sqm. Very high quality bedding. Fully air conditioned and fully equipped kitchens.
 
1 The Deluxe Apartment, 105sqm is facing our  backyard.  It comes with 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms  and a very nice and stylish main room. Please note that the small bedroom with two single beds is more appropriate for kids (Low ceiling).

2 The Royal Suite with balcony, 104 sqm, is facing the Cours Mirabeau with 3 beautiful balconies. It comes with 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and an incredible main room with magnificent old fireplace. 

3 The Deluxe Suite, 101 sqm, is facing the Cours Mirabeau with also 3 beautiful balbonies. It comes with 1 very big bedroom with it own balcony, one bedroom on a loft above the main room, and a tiny bedroom more appropriate for kids (lader access , low ceiling). Two bathrooms and a superb main room.

4 The Superior Apartment, 100 sqm, is facing the backyard. It comes with one very big bedroom, and a second bedroom with 2 dedicated area (one above the other, in the same room), two bathrooms and a big main room.

5 The Junior Terace Suite, 48sqm, is facing our backyard and our Terace. This 30sqm private terace will only be accessible by you. This suite also comes with a big bedroom above the main room, and a bathroom.

6 The Junior Suite with balcony, 48 sqm, is facing the Cours Mirabeau with a balcony surrounding the street. It comes with one bedroom (beware of the old wood beam on the ceiling), a beautiful main room and a bathroom.

7 The small Suite with balcony, 34 sqm, facing  the Cours Mirabeau. It comes with a nice balcony.  The bedoom is above the kitchen on a loft with a ceiling at 183 cm and an old wood beam crossing the ceiling (can be an issue for tall guests). A small main room and one bathroom.

Our Spa area is open from 9 am. to 8 pm. and accessible to people over 18 years old. You can find more information about us by looking on our website.
Please look for «suites du cours Aix en Provence » and you will find it.
Merci ! We are located ON the famous Cours Mirabeau.
Right in the middle, between the two “Mossy Fountains”, and facing south.
Quite simply the best location to discover Aix en Provence.
The Cours Mirabeau is in a pedestrian zone, therefore car-free. Ideal for a quiet stay. The Mignet and Rotonde car parks allow you to park nearby (330m)

title: Hotel Cardinal
description:
Located in Aix-en-Provence, 19 miles from Joliette Metro Station, Hotel Cardinal features views of the city. The 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. The property is 400 yards from the city center and 19 miles from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station.

At the hotel, the rooms include a desk. Selected rooms also feature a kitchenette with a fridge, a microwave and a stovetop. All rooms in Hotel Cardinal are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast.

Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Center is 20 miles from Hotel Cardinal, while Vieux Port Metro Station is 20 miles from the property. Marseille Provence Airport is 17 miles away.

top_reviews.review: I thoroughly enjoyed my stay here at this very charming hotel.

This is a small hotel that is in a fabulous location for walking to everything in Aix. I would describe it as shabby-chic in the very best meaning possible. It was a great introduction to Provence with custom bedding and curtains. Modern bathroom, lift for easy access to upper rooms. Breakfast was delightful! We had a wonderful time there and it was so convenient!! Best with no car as no parking at hotel. Loved it all!
Fabulous location and the room had real French charm.
The charm of the Hotel!  The location! Comfy bed & great linens & decor.  Best ever on this trip :) Slippery bath tub, needs traction strips.
I love the provincial small hotel.  The staff was very customer oriented. I enjoyed my stay.  The hotels location is excellent. I will stay again. I was very happy with my stay.
Charming hotel in the heart of Aix. Spacious cool room and bathroom. Staff were very helpful and friendly.
Easy check in.  Charming room.  Great location.  Good bed and bathroom.  Easy access.

We loved the location right next to the Granet museum. The room was comfortable, cozy, furnished with authentic 19th century furniture. The whole place was decorated with unique hand-painted works belonging to the family. Breakfast was typically French and very tasty.
Breakfast was very good with a variety of options.

Location is great. There was free street parking. 
Price was reasonable given location.
The hotel original style is preserved with very much everything antique, including the bedrooms which are small, with red carpet, and old furniture. For people who like modern facilities with clean look this is not for you. The rooms are simple and you feel you are at your grandmother's house. Notheless, that helped us feel immersed in that era. The bathroom was OK. The shower head was only a handheld one, so it can be annoying.
Breakfast was not worth it.
Staff was kind of cold.

title: Campanile Prime - Aix-en-Provence Sud - Pont de l'Arc
description:
Located in Aix-en-Provence, 1.9 mi from the historical center and Cours Mirabeau, Campanile Aix-en-Provence Sud - Pont de l'Arc offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi.

Each of the guest rooms is equipped with a flat-screen TV. Tea and coffee making facilities are available in each room.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning at the hotel. The hotel's restaurant serves contemporary French cuisine that can be enjoyed on the terrace during the summer months. Campanile Aix-en-Provence also offers hot and cold buffet.

The hotel is serviced by a elevator and free private parking is available on site. A bus stop can be found opposite the hotel, where direct bus access is available to the city center.

The property is 8.1 mi from Aix-en-Provence TGV Train Station and 5 mi away from Aix en Provence Arena stadium and concert hall. Marseille Provence Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

Nearby facilties and locations : Sismic ( Concert and Entertenaiment), L'Arena ( Concert and Entertenaiment), Grand Theater de Provence, Private Hospital

Attractions : Pavillon Vendome, Provencal Market (1.9 mi)
property_highlights: Free private parking available at the hotel

top_reviews.review: Very easy check-in and in an ideal location close to Aix. Nice bakery just around the corner. Big plus that there was parking on the property. Everything was new and clean. The air conditioning only goes down to 22C so it was a bit hot sleeping at night.

This is not a fancy place in a historic old part of town, it is a basic hotel for people on their way somewhere. I stayed because my apartment was not ready in Aix and it was all I could get on short notice. I was really pleasantly surprised. The staff were delightful, the room well equipped. I particularly appreciated the built in desk/table along the window. The breakfast and dinners were inexpensive, but great for the price. And there is a little garden where you can have your meals. The shower was especially nice for an American, a real shower head.
Great experience. Room is clean and staffs are nice. Location is well connected.

The room is comfortable and clean. 
It's easy to reach by car and they offer free parking. 
It's 40 min walking from the city center, but there are also public transport options.
Very nice room and friendly staff. Excellent value. No negatives.
Big pillows, comfy bed, handy for bus (no4), good rain shower, free parking. All ok really, stairways a bit tatty.

excellent room for sleeping. Everything was clean and in good condition.
There are several shops and McDonald's nearby.
Good sized room, clean, large bathroom, hot drink facilities in room and twin beds. Parking available and easy drive into the city. Was unable to get two cards for the room.

We hot exactly what we paid for....and good value.
Staff were exceptionally friendly
Large, clean room. Excellent breakfast with great range of cheese and high quality ingredients. Very helpful staff 20 mins walk with long hill. WiFi didn’t work in room

title: Domaine de Saint Clair
description:
Domaine de Saint Clair is an adults-only Bed&Breakfast located just 2.1 mi (10 minutes) from the historic center of Aix-en-Provence.

The guest rooms at Domaine de Saint Clair are located in a Provençal house, independent of the mansion. The Domaine de Saint Clair offers only 3 spacious suites to guarantee peace and privacy, in a privileged setting. The suites of 30 m2 each are recently restored and warmly decorated.

The house is fully air-conditioned and has free Wi-Fi internet access.

All suites overlook a large shared terrace with a view of a wooded garden. Their private bathroom has a walk-in shower and all necessary amenities.

The Domaine offers a large outdoor swimming pool, open in season, sunny all day and lined with century-old pines providing shade in the garden surrounding the swimming pool.

A continental breakfast is served on the seasonal terrace or in the breakfast room.

The Estate benefits from an exceptional location, offering the tranquility of the Aix countryside and proximity to the bustling city all year round, with its narrow streets, rich mansions, magnificent fountains and café terraces...

Secure private parking is available free of charge.

The Luberon region is a 25-minute drive away from Domaine de Saint Clair and Les Baux-de-Provence in the Alpilles region is 44 minutes from the property.
Couples in particular like the location – they rated it 9.6 for a two-person trip.
property_highlights: Free Private Parking Available On Site

top_reviews.review:
Everything about this lovely retreat in the countryside was marvelous.  The breakfast was terrific.  The hostess provided information about regional towns and sights that was both informed and spot on for our interests.
We will return and stay longer. There is nothing not to like.

Quiet, peaceful, relaxing country setting, yet close to the city for shopping and restaurants. Our hostess, Florence, was so gracious, accommodating and helpful, with advice on the best restaurants and wineries.  Wonderful breakfasts featured local products.
Beautiful estate with clean rooms furnished with high end products. Accommodating host who gives great advice on local recommendations. Most importantly property is gated and we felt very safe! None
Fantastic experience! Idyllic stay in Provence. Warm and welcoming host. Beautiful grounds!
Unique experience staying in a guest house on an estate A small point that I did not even ask Florence to resolve; on hot days I prefer to sleep with only a sheet instead of a light comforter

Beautiful, expansive estate less than 5 kms from the heart of Aix.  Newly renovated, spacious bed and bathrooms. Thoughtfully stocked common kitchen and ample included breakfast. Stunning pool amid formal gardens. Charming outdoor pergola and terrace for relaxing and breakfast. I couldn’t figure out how to open the shutters in the bedroom in the morning.
We loved everything about it!!! If you look for a peaceful and private place to stay as a couple near Aix en Provence. This is the place!!

Florence is a fabulous host, the grounds are beautiful, and the room and bed are big and comfortable. We couldn't get over how well done and thoughtful everything was and staying here having wine/cheese at the pool and on the terrace at night was one of the highlights of our trip. I recommend renting a car and driving to downtown Aix, it's very easy with a great 3 Euro parking option. N/A!

The rooms were very comfortable - super big and had every single detail one could ask for. Every corner of the property was very beautiful. The host Florence is so kind and helpful - she gave us great recommendations and one day served breakfast earlier to accommodate our early departure. Nothing

This is a beautiful property near the historic town of Aix-en-Provence.  The old town itself was well kept with limited auto traffic, narrow streets, lots of shops, excellent restaurants and frequent markets around the many squares. The grounds around the property were exceptional with walks around gardens, olive orchards and a pine forest with a view down on the town.  The accommodations were very comfortable with an arbored patio, dining area, and spacious bedrooms.  The proprietors were kind, charming and most helpful to a group of weary travelers looking for a nice peaceful stay. Not a thing!

title: Adonis Arc Hotel Aix
description:
Set in the heart of the Provence region, Adonis Arc Hotel Aix is fully air-conditioned and is located a 5-minute drive from Aix-en-Provence city center. It features a seasonal outdoor pool and a terrace. Free WiFi is provided throughout.

All of the rooms have a private bathroom equipped with a bathtub. They feature a desk, flat-screen TV and telephone.

Adonis Arc Hotel Aix provides daily buffet breakfast. There is a bar and you can enjoy a drink by the pool. Deckchairs are also at your disposal on the sun terrace.

The front desk is open 24 hours a day and Adonis Arc Hotel Aix is just a 3-minute drive from the A8 motorway, exit 31, leading to Marseille or Nice. Free private parking is possible on site.

We take a €100 bank imprint for all guests on arrival.
This is to ensure respect for the common areas and the peace and quiet of our guests.
The deposit is automatically returned on departure, when the rooms are checked out.

top_reviews.review:
Just off motorway. Walkable to city center. Small hotel, free parking. Terrace. Friendly staff, English speaking
Clean room, comfy beds. Pool, lounge chairs.
AC worked well. Bathroom is ok. Bathtub Pool is smaller than on pictures, guests smoke around pool. Not ideal for children
Older building but well kept and comfortable. Friendly staff and good breakfast choices. Great value.
very helpful and friendly staff, convenient location, easy access to public transport in a fascinating cultural city.

Nice pool area, bar open all the time, friendly staff, right next to the motorway, parking in safe area in front if the hotel 
good value for the price location around hotel did not seem too safe 
you had to give a deposit of 100 euros
garden view in my case was basically a hedge just outside the window.
Lovely hotel, just off the motorway. Pool area was busy but had a lovely atmosphere. Lovely and peaceful as the sun dropped.

The receptionist ( Jeanelle ? )  was very helpful and welcoming ,  we didn’t expect to see anybody but her presence was very positive .   Nothing was a problem , she really represents the hotel well , and good English 45 rooms ,   10 parking spaces .     Must do better

Hotel is perfect, with a nice price, staff are polite and kindness. Hotel is so cozy and warm with all facilities. Bed is perfect and bathroom has a nice size and commodities. I for sure stay there again. Nothing to complain regardign the hotel and staff. Nonetheless, because the hotel price is good, some guests are noisy, talk loud and sometimes damage the quality of the hotel. Hope guests could be more educated during their stays in the future.

Staff were very helpful and pleasant; clean rooms and lounge areas; 24/7 bar; good value for money. Location wasn’t perfect although a taxi into town was only 5/10 minutes. However we knew this before arrival.

Small but nice swimming pool, good Wi-Fi and staff very nice. There is a nice park to run/walk nearby and the city is 20/30’ walk distance also served with buses . I think the location could be good also for teleworking from there. Breakfast could be improved with some more fresh fruits .

Decent price, not far from center, pet friendly and free parking They ask for a deposit of 100€ for the room, not sure if this is only for those travelling with pets but be aware. Seems a bit much for me to be honest

title: Terrasse & Spa dans Aix Hypercentre
description:
Waves House is located in Aix-en-Provence, just 19 miles from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station and 19 miles from Joliette Metro Station. The property is around 19 miles from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Center, 19 miles from Vieux Port Metro Station, and 19 miles from Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations. The accommodation offers a hot tub, free Wifi throughout the property, and an elevator.

Featuring garden and city views, this apartment features 1 bedroom and opens to a terrace. The air-conditioned apartment also provides a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a seating area, washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a hot tub and a bath. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Castellane Metro Station is 20 miles from the apartment, while Saint-Ferreol Street is 20 miles away. Marseille Provence Airport is 16 miles from the property.

top_reviews.review: The apartment was very nicely, decorated and included almost everything you would need. Claire was very responsive and helpful. Very centrally located. Because the air conditioning is in the living area, the bedroom does not get as cool as the rest of the apartment. But eventually, it was acceptable. To be fair, it was extremely hot when I stayed in Aix. The temperature was around 100°F.
Stylish, well located apartment, friendly and helpful host, and the nice private terrace. Initially we had to adjust to some of the technology, and then we were fine.

Clean, well-decorated and equipped.
Kitchen had all the utensils needed, balcony was great for drying clothes. Bathroom floor would get wet from bathtub shower without shower curtain. Also, some light “hacking” sounds heard from the bathroom, presumably from neighbouring unit
appartements propre confortable et très bien situé

Séjour idéal 
L’appartement présente tout le nécessaire… et plus 
Vraiment top
Idéalement situé à côté de tout Rien

Super appartement, bien équipé. Très mignon, confortable et propre. Bien situé pour accéder au centre ville facilement à pied, tout en étant au calme. Nous sommes restés qu'une nuit mais c'était très agréable. Les informations d'arrivée et de départ sont très claires, mais une flexibilité sur l'heure du départ sans frais supplémentaires serait appréciée.
Apartamento lindo, limpíssimo, localização perfeita, bem equipado.

le soin et la décoration apportés à l’appartement , rien ne manquait .  Les personnes de contact  pour l’appartement ont été formidables! 
Ils se sont même déplacés , ils ont toujours répondu très rapidement à mes messages avec beaucoup de gentillesse . les couloirs pour arriver à l’appartement !

La gentillesse de la propriétaire j'avais oublié ma tablette elle me l à mise de côté 
Appartement super bien placé  propre bon rapport qualité prix Ras

The first thing that greeted us when we arrived early was the helpful and warm responsiveness of the host - Claire. She was patient and really helpful to all our queries on the platform, whether it was the PIN code or the cooker stove. This is much appreciated. The location is simply outstanding with Carrefour and Monoprix just downstairs and allowed us to get what we need very conveniently for a 10day stay. I would highly recommend this property for a couple or singles or a short term stay. If I have to pick one thing, it would be that the cups were not so clean when we checked in. We have everything we need to live there like it’s our apartment so no major issue with that.

title: Studio climatisé plein centre 4eme étage
description:
Studio climatisé plein centre 4eme étage is located in Aix-en-Provence, just 19 miles from Joliette Metro Station and 20 miles from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Center. Featuring city views, this apartment also has free Wifi. The property is 300 yards from the city center and 19 miles from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station.

This air-conditioned apartment comes with a dining area, a fully equipped kitchenette with a fridge, and a TV. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Vieux Port Metro Station is 20 miles from the apartment, while Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations is 20 miles away. Marseille Provence Airport is 17 miles from the property.

top_reviews.review: The property is very beautiful, clean and comfortable

Ottima posizione e ottima gestione dei piccoli spazi.
La casa anche se molto piccola ha due belle finestre che creano luce e arieggiano la casa, e sono anche insonorizzanti. Non abbiamo trovato il telecomando del climatizzatore; divano letto scomodo.

Il monolocale è molto carino, ma davvero piccolino, con un divano letto sufficientemente comodo. La posizione è perfetta per girare il centro a piedi, ma non c'è il parcheggio auto. Ci sarebbe un parcheggio interrato a pochi passi ma è nella zona ztl e piuttosto caro. Noi abbiamo parcheggio lungo una strada a circa 700 mt. Non c'è l'ascensore e le scale sono impegnative con i bagagli che è meglio siano piccoli. La cucina non è attrezzata di niente, se non un paio di tazze e bicchieri e posate. Nemmeno un cavatappi,  ci siamo fatti aprire la bottiglia dal bar sotto.
La prima sera c'era un dj che suonava nel bar, e si sentiva un pochino di rumore fino a tardi, ma non troppo disturbante.
l'emplacement central , la renovation et la vue depuis le studio l'escalier étroit pour monter avec les valises
L'emplacement, la disponibilité de l'hôte, le confort de ce qu'il y avait, tout était top, merci ! Rien, tout était bien !
Right on one of the squares in the centre of old Aix. Lovely view. The 4 flights of stairs was a pain when we carried luggage up and down.

Mitt i den gamla staden vid ett trevligt torg. Kulturhus från 16/1700 tal. Helt modernt och nyrenoverad lägenhet. Unikt, fint och väldigt speciellt. Lätt att få kontakt med värden. Den smala, sneda trappan till fjärde våningen är svår för den som är mindre rörlig. 
Lägenheten hade brandvarnare men kanske skulle det också finnas brandsläckare i lägenheterna med hänsyn till den smala trappan.

La vue superbe sur la place des cardeurs. L'animation dans le quartier. La proximité du centre.
La décoration du studio et sa clarté.
Très jolie salle de bains L'escalier vraiment étroit. 
Le canapé lit grinçant
L'appartement est très bien situé et refait à neuf. Il n'y a pas de lumière pour lire au lit. Le canapé lit est fortement creusé au milieu.

Jättefint rum! Läget kan inte bli bättre - magiskt med uteserveringarna rakt nedanför. Utsikten från de fina fönstren är ljuvlig! Fräscht och fint möblerat. Bra badrum. Skönt med välfungerande AC. Fel adress och kod!
Det stod fel adress och fel portkod i bokningen! Det blev en hel del krångel med det. Jag lyckades hitta trots fel adress enbart genom envishet - och lyckades komma in genom porten trots fel kod, enbart pga andra gäster som lyckades få tag på uthyraren (som inte pratade engelska). 

Smutsiga lakan! 
Jag kan stå ut med lite damm - men förväntar mig rena lakan som ett minimum. Här var lakanen uppenbart redan använda. Rätt äckligt. Jag fick leta efter andra lakan i en låda och byta själv innan jag kunde lägga mig. Dock fanns inga andra örngott, så troligen sov jag på redan använda… 

Stort minus. 

Det låg också smutsiga bestick i kökslådorna och det var inte helt rent överlag. 

Synd på annars så väldigt fint boende!

title: Lou Pitchoun
description:
Lou Pitchoun in Aix-en-Provence provides accommodations with free Wifi, 19 miles from Joliette Metro Station, 20 miles from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Center, and 20 miles from Vieux Port Metro Station. The property is around 20 miles from Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations, 20 miles from Castellane Metro Station, and 20 miles from Saint-Ferreol Street. The property is 19 miles from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station and within 400 yards of the city center.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen with dining area, and 1 bathroom with walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

La Timone Metro Station is 21 miles from the apartment, while Notre Dame de la Garde Basilica is 21 miles away. Marseille Provence Airport is 17 miles from the property.

top_reviews.review: Amazing little apartment in a fantastic location in the centre of Aix, with cafes and restaurants really close. I had an initial problem but Chris got it sorted quickly. Comfy bed, nicely decorated spaces and compact kitchen. Really good shower. It's ground floor but felt secure - electric shutters were easy to use and ensured privacy at night. It is a little dark but I wasn't in there much during the day.

The downstairs unit was small but great however the upstairs unit was incredibly hot during the recent heat wave
I would recommend not booking the upstairs unit if hot weather is predicted
Chris and Marie were very helpful and apart from the problem with the heat in the upstairs unit I had an enjoyable 24 day stay Just the heat in the upstairs unit
Perfect location in the centre of Aix, tastefully decorated and immaculately clean.  Plenty of space for 2 people and I will definitely stay again on my next visit.

Great little apartment in very good location. 
Comfortable bed and we'll equipped kitchen. Everything was fine.
The landlord-Chris can always be patient to answer my questions and very helpful! None

Very cozy, cute and stylish apartment. Kitchen is fully equipped, you can find salt, pepper, oil, dishes, different kind of glasses. Towels are good quality, fantastic local liquid soap in bathroom. Located in the city centre in old historical building. Owners are very friendly and helpful, if I come back in Aix, for sure I will stay in this apartment again! All was great

bel appartement proche Estsciomenro Bellegard avec un super appartement complet, les propriétaires Chris et Marie sont super gentils, je le recommande les yeux fermés, super calme, merci aux propriétaires J'ai beaucoup aimé tout, il manque une télévision qui s'adaptera à Netflix et une machine à laver
L'emplacement en ville,la facilité pour s'y rendre,la décoration, la propreté du lieu,la parking très proche tout était optimum

Situation idéale en centre ville dans une rue calme. 
Séjour calme et confortable malgré sa situation en RDC.
Appartement joliment et intelligemment aménagé. très agréable.
Hôte très aimable et arrangeant. RAS

L'emplacement est idéal pour visiter la ville et l'appartement est très confortable pour un séjour à deux.
Bien que situé dans la vielle ville, le logement est très calme.
J'y reviendrai si j'en ai l'occasion. La VMC un peu bruyante, peut-être avoir le moyen de la couper la nuit...

title: La Villa Rustica
description:
A recently renovated vacation home, La Villa Rustica offers accommodations in Aix-en-Provence. This property offers access to a terrace, free private parking, and free Wifi. Outdoor seating is also available at the vacation home.

The air-conditioned vacation home consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and slippers. Towels and bed linen are offered in the vacation home. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

A selection of options including fresh pastries and juice are available for the continental breakfast.

Guests can also relax in the garden.

Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station is 21 miles from La Villa Rustica, while Joliette Metro Station is 22 miles from the property. Marseille Provence Airport is 19 miles away.

top_reviews.review: Very nice and modern villa. The host is very responsive and made sure we were comfortable. Highly recommend.
There is nothing not to like.  Perfect accommodation.  Everything is new and well thought thru.

Everything was wonderful. The facilities were new and clean, and the host was very friendly. While everything is wonderful now, it might be even better to provide a more generous supply of things like detergent and coffee capsules. To be clear, we had enough, but a little extra would be a nice touch.

New, clean, and fully equipped apartment, private parking, nice yard. Shopping center and restaurant nearby. Sabrina was available and very helpful. The apartment is a 10-minute drive from Aix-en-Provence, which we didn’t expect. However, it wasn’t a problem. There’s a bus station near the apartment, and it’s very easy to get around by car

Everything was easy, clean, safe and comfortable. I loved the furnishings, and it had everything I needed to cook a small meal. The location a little outside of Aix city center was great for me to avoid traffic and easily get to my work site. It was perfect for my trip. nothing - it was all good!
Alles. Super Ausstattung,  super Lage für alle möglichen Ausflüge. Super nette Betreuung.
Très beau logement , bien équipé ,parking pratique .Sabrina est très à l écoute et réactive .

Très beau logement, décoré avec goût et impeccablement propre. Il est très bien équipé, avec une literie top pour un excellent confort. L'emplacement est idéal, à seulement 10 mn en voiture du centre ville. Je recommande vivement cette adresse, vous ne serez pas déçu ! Rien

Odlična lokacija. Malo ven iz mesta, vendar na mirnem mestu. Avtobusna postaja dobesedno pred hišo in vožnja do mesta z avtobusom traja slabih 10 minut. Hiša je čudovita, čista, moderna. Vse je kot novo. Lastnica Sabrine, naju je pričakala in nama razložila vse potrebno. Vse super. Škoda, da ne morem dati ocene 11.
Logement propre et neuf et parfaitement équipé. Possibilité d’arriver en autonomie à n’importe quelle heure.le parking fermé

title: La Gracette
description:
La Gracette offers air-conditioned accommodations in Aix-en-Provence. This property offers access to a terrace and free private parking. Outdoor seating is also available at the bed and breakfast.

At the bed and breakfast, the units include a wardrobe. The rooms include a coffee machine, a private bathroom, and free Wifi, while selected rooms also offer a balcony and some have garden views. The rooms are equipped with heating facilities.

Guests at La Gracette can enjoy hiking nearby, or make the most of the garden.

Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station is 16 miles from the accommodation, while Joliette Metro Station is 16 miles from the property. Marseille Provence Airport is 13 miles away.
property_highlights: Free Private Parking Available On Site

top_reviews.review: We very much enjoyed the company of the owners. The staff was attentive and charming. The historic farmhouse was delightful. The drive into Aix was chaotic. Restaurants in the immediate vicinity were very limited. Abundant mosquitos.

A delightful island of calm and green in the outskirts of Aix, otherwise dominated by light industry. The hosts were very welcoming and personable. Finding our way to the bus stop was not difficult, and buses into Aix were frequent. In the studio, steep staircase to the sleeping area under the roof was a little bit challenging.
Beautiful house, amazing breakfast with lovely owners who have so many interesting stories to tell.

Spacious room with good aircon and big bathroom. Lovely host greeted us on arrival and made us feel welcome. Secure car parking. Quiet environment. Location for us was fine with a car, Aix was 10-15min drive. I believe there is a bus but to keep in mind it is not in town.
Lovely hosts who were so kind to impart local knowledge and meant we saw some beautiful places around the area. Lovely homemade breakfast too! Bring mosquito spray as there are quite a few around!

A very tranquil, Nobel, large and beautiful mansion. 
Ms and Mr (sorry I forgot to how to spell their name;) are very friendly and helpful. 
Although it’s not in the Center of Aix, but not very far, by taking a Uber you can find it. There is also bus to go to Aix and Marseille not far, but I only know that after Ms grandma tell me. 
Breakfast is fresh and well prepared, I can also sit outside to enjoy it.
L’accueil chaleureux des hôtes, le calme et le jardin Le lit en mezzanine avec le plafond trop bas

Un moment suspendu, exceptionnel, riche, poétique, reposant auprès de Raphaëlle et Dana, un couple sensible, cultivé, bienveillant, accueillant. Le jardin est à leur image : joyeux, foisonnant, artistique, ouvert, ressourçant...
Nous y retournerons assurément et nous le recommandons vivement à tous les amoureux de l'authentique, loin des artifices, à ceux qui savent prendre le temps de vivre, et tout ça à proximité d'Aix en Provence et de la Sainte Victoire. Un bijou ! Rien !

Los dueños, Raphaelle y Dana, fueron super amables desde el primer momento. Su casa con jardin es estupenda para pasar unos días en Aix-en Provence tanto por trabajo como para unas vacaciones.
El desayuno fue exquisito. Un lugar para sentirte como en casa!
Staff molto gentile. Posizione tranquilla ma a 5 minuti dal centro di Aix Nei dintorni non è facile trovare dove mangiare se non spostandosi con la macchina
